site.name: FutureAI
site.title: FutureAI - The Future of Artificial Intelligence

hero.title: The future is not human-only.
hero.subtitle: Discover unlimited possibilities of artificial intelligence and shape the future of technology today

howItWorks.title: How Artificial Intelligence Works
howItWorks.description: Discover the process by which AI transforms raw data into practical solutions for everyday problems

step1.title: Data
step1.description: AI analyzes vast amounts of information from various sources - text, images, sounds, and numbers

step2.title: Model
step2.description: Algorithms learn patterns and relationships, creating an intelligent decision-making system

step3.title: Result
step3.description: AI generates accurate predictions, recommendations, and solutions tailored to your needs

generator.title: AI Prediction Generator
generator.description: Interactive generator that showcases fascinating expert predictions about artificial intelligence development in the coming years. Each click reveals a new vision of technology's future.
generator.placeholder: Click the button to discover a fascinating prediction about AI's future...

showcase.title: AI in Action
showcase.description: See examples of what artificial intelligence can create today - from images to music and text

image.title: Image Generation
image.desc: AI creates photorealistic images from text descriptions

video.title: Video Production
video.desc: Automatic creation of films and animations

music.title: Music Composition
music.desc: AI composes original tracks in any style

text.title: Text Writing
text.desc: Generating articles, reports and creative content
text.staticContent: Artificial Intelligence is revolutionizing the way we work and live. From automating complex tasks to providing intelligent insights, its impact is visible in every field. It supports doctors in diagnosing diseases, optimizes global supply chains, and personalizes education to meet the needs of every student. AI is also becoming a partner in the creative process, opening up entirely new horizons of possibility for us...
text.typewriterContent: Artificial Intelligence is revolutionizing the way we work and live. From automating complex tasks to providing intelligent insights, AI systems are becoming increasingly sophisticated. Modern language models can understand context, generate creative content, and assist with problem-solving across diverse fields including healthcare, finance, and education...

myths.title: AI Myths & Facts
myths.description: Discover the truth about artificial intelligence and learn facts that might surprise you

myth1.myth: AI will replace all humans at work
myth1.fact: AI will collaborate with humans, creating new types of jobs and increasing productivity in existing roles.

myth2.myth: AI is more intelligent than humans
myth2.fact: Current AI consists of specialized tools. They don't possess consciousness or general intelligence like humans.

myth3.fact: AI requires enormous amounts of high-quality data to learn and function properly.

myth4.fact: Modern AI solutions are becoming increasingly energy-efficient and help optimize energy consumption.

myth5.myth: AI is only available to large corporations
myth5.fact: More and more AI tools are becoming available to small businesses and individual users.

myth6.fact: AI can make mistakes and its decisions depend on data quality and algorithms. It requires human oversight.

footer.description: We shape the future of technology through innovative artificial intelligence solutions. Join us on this journey towards a better tomorrow.

sections.title: 1. General Provisions
sections.content: These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of FutureAI's Website, located at its web address and related services.

definitions.def: the FutureAI website and all related functionalities and services.
any natural person using the Service.

sections.title: 3. Terms of Use
sections.content: Use of the Service is free of charge and does not require registration. The User agrees to use the Service in accordance with its intended purpose and applicable law.

sections.title: 4. Intellectual Property
sections.content: All content published in the Service, including texts, graphics, logos, is the intellectual property of FutureAI and is protected by copyright law.

sections.title: 5. Disclaimer
sections.content: The Service is for educational and informational purposes only. The content presented in the Service does not constitute legal, financial, or investment advice.

sections.title: 6. Final Provisions
sections.content: The terms may be changed. Users will be informed of any changes by publishing the new version of the terms on the Service.

sections.title: 1. General Information
sections.content: This privacy policy sets out the principles for the processing and protection of personal data of users of the FutureAI service.

sections.title: 2. Data Controller
sections.content: The controller of personal data is FutureAI, responsible for the secure processing of entrusted data.

sections.title: 3. Scope of Data Collected
sections.content: The service may collect the following data:
items: Technical data (IP address, browser type, operating system)
Data about activity on the site (pages visited, visit duration)

sections.title: 4. Purpose of Data Processing

items: Ensuring the proper functioning of the service

sections.content: In matters concerning personal data protection, you can contact us via the contact form available on the service.
